title: The role of left atrio-ventricular coupling index and left atrial ejection fraction in predicting onset of atrial fibrillation and adverse cardiac events in hypertrophic …
details: F Parisi, E La Franca, L Pistelli, G Gentile, D Bellavia… - 2024
abstract: Background In recent years, several indexes have been proposed to predict atrial fibrillation (AF) in hypertrophic cardiomyopathy (HCM) patients, but with limited accuracy. This study aims to assess the role of new echocardiographic parameters in …
